IP_SYN_1_style_9:
DIAGNOSIS: Airway blockade due to prosthesis migration.
PROCEDURE: Rigid endoscopy with retrieval of foreign material and prosthetic implantation.
DETAILS: We id[REDACTED] the esophageal device obstructing the airway. Using heavy graspers, we extracted the device in sections. A fistula was noted. We implanted a Y-shaped silicone prosthesis to scaffold the airway and cover the defect. Ventilation was established via an endotracheal tube.
